results.title: On a Sunday he went fishing
results.creator_credit: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sarah Mifsud, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Sarah Mifsud’s father was an avid fisherman as was his father before him. Mifsud tells of the ordinary Sunday which turned tragically extraordinary for her family and the journey to rebuild in the aftermath.

results.title: Life will never be the same
results.creator_credit: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: ‘You don’t need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.’ Amanda Jurisic remembers her father’s legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Amanda Jurisic, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: ‘You don’t need to jump on a plane, or go to a theme park or stay at a five star hotel to experience the beautiful things in life.’ Amanda Jurisic remembers her father’s legacy : a sense of adventure and a love of travel. The values he taught her have stayed with her, and inspired her to travel the world.

results.title: Just say no
results.creator_credit: Christiana Dumitru, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Christiana Dumitru’s father died and her family had to move, she turned to a partying lifestyle. Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Christiana Dumitru, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: When Christiana Dumitru’s father died and her family had to move, she turned to a partying lifestyle. Hooked on drugs at an alarmingly young age, Dumitru reflects on the strength of will she had to summon to get back on track and the friends and family she has learnt to value.

results.title: BMX is life
results.creator_credit: Harley Van Belkolm, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Riding and doing tricks on his BMX is when Harley Van Belkolm feels free. He provides some insight into this passion of his, the culture that surrounds it and why he wouldn’t be doing anything else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Harley Van Belkolm, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Becoming me
results.creator_credit: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: When Tyson Cunningham can’t express himself, music does it for him. Although he has long given up dreams of fronting a band like his brother, music is still everything to him, and expresses his emotional life like nothing else.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Tyson Cunningham, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Digital Storytelling workshop : general public (March 2009)
results.brief_description: Seven members of the general public participate in ACMI’s Digital Storytelling program. Through the life changing events and tributes to family members, resonates a search for identity and a sense of home.

results.title: May's story
results.creator_credit: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: In 1895, at the age of 24, May sailed to Japan and dedicated her life to caring for the children in the villages. Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Sue Freeth, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: In 1895, at the age of 24, May sailed to Japan and dedicated her life to caring for the children in the villages. Sue Freeth, with the help of some of May’s ex-students, traces the path walked by May, and in doing so comes closer to understanding the life of this amazing woman.

results.title: Longing for belonging
results.creator_credit: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Jane Harrison’s search for belonging is a road trip with a lot of potholes along the way. Of mixed descent, she has longed to connect with her Indigenous heritage, which has forced her to confront some issues and attitudes within Australian society today.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jane Harrison, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Experience the unknown
results.creator_credit: Valentina Zingg, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Overwhelmed by choice, Valentina Zingg decides to journey to a land very different to Switzerland. While this hot, dry land helps her gain perspective, there is still something missing…
